metadata.title: CVE-2015-3875 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: libutils in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48T allows remote attackers to executearbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via acrafted audio file, aka internal bug 22952485.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
